Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement FCM topic-based notifications

Convert notification system from device-token multicast to topic-based
messaging, giving users fine-grained control over notification categories.

Topics:
- {groupId}_progress_logs for progress_logged notifications
- {groupId}_group_events for goal_added, goal_archived, member_approved,
  member_removed, member_left, member_promoted

Changes:
- Add FcmTopicManager for topic subscription management
- Update NotificationPreferences with topic-aware setters
- ProfileFragment fetches group IDs and uses topic-aware preference setters
- PursueFirebaseMessagingService resubscribes to topics on token refresh
- JoinGroupBottomSheet subscribes to topics on successful join
- GroupDetailFragment unsubscribes from topics when leaving group

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
